name: Iron Bank
description: Iron Bank is a protocol-to-protocol lending platform and liquidity backstop for the entire DeFi ecosystem. It offers whitelisted protocols access to uncollateralized loans.

en.name: Iron Bank
en.description: Iron Bank is a protocol-to-protocol lending platform and liquidity backstop for the entire DeFi ecosystem. It offers whitelisted protocols access to uncollateralized loans.

fr.name: Iron Bank
fr.description: L'Iron Bank est une plate-forme de prêt de protocole à protocole et un backstop de liquidité pour l'ensemble de l'écosystème DeFi. Elle offre aux protocoles whitelistés un accès à des prêts non garantis.

es.name: Iron Bank
es.description: Iron Bank es una plataforma de préstamos entre protocolos y un respaldo de liquidez para todo el ecosistema DeFi. Ofrece a protocolos preaprobados el acceso a préstamos sin garantía.

de.name: Iron Bank
de.description: Iron Bank ist eine Plattform für die Kreditvergabe von Protokoll zu Protokoll und ein Liquiditäts-Backstop für das gesamte DeFi Ökosystem. Sie bietet Whitelist-Protokollen Zugang zu unbesicherten Krediten.

pt.name: Iron Bank
pt.description: Iron Bank é uma plataforma de empréstimo protocolo-protocolo e uma reserva de liquidez para todo o ecossistema DeFi. Ele oferece acesso à empréstimos sem necessidade de garantia para protocolos previamente liberados.

el.name: Iron Bank
el.description: Iron Bank is a protocol-to-protocol lending platform and liquidity backstop for the entire DeFi ecosystem. It offers whitelisted protocols access to uncollateralized loans.

tr.name: Iron Bank
tr.description: Iron Bank, tüm DeFi ekosistemi için protokolden protokole kredi platformu ve likidite desteği sağlar. Teminatsız kredilere beyaz listeye alınmış protokollere erişimi sunar.

vi.name: Iron Bank
vi.description: Iron Bank is a protocol-to-protocol lending platform and liquidity backstop for the entire DeFi ecosystem. It offers whitelisted protocols access to uncollateralized loans.

zh.name: Iron Bank
zh.description: Iron Bank is a protocol-to-protocol lending platform and liquidity backstop for the entire DeFi ecosystem. It offers whitelisted protocols access to uncollateralized loans.

hi.name: Iron Bank
hi.description: Iron Bank पूरे DeFi इकोसिस्टम के लिए एक प्रोटोकॉल-टू-प्रोटोकॉल लेंडिंग प्लेटफॉर्म और लिक्विडिटी बैकस्टॉप है। यह श्वेतसूचीबद्ध प्रोटोकॉल को अन-कोलेटरलाईस्ड ऋणों तक पहुंच प्रदान करता है।
